data.title: Friday's Reds vs. Tigers game won't air on Bally Sports. Here's how to watch it
data.meta_description: Cincinnati Reds fans won't find Friday's game on Bally Sports Ohio. Here's where to watch it.
data.text:
Hot off their first three-game sweep against the New York Yankees in the Bronx, the Cincinnati Reds are returning home to face the Detroit Tigers on Friday.

The Reds vs. Tigers Saturday and Sunday games will be available to watch on Bally Sports Ohio, as usual. Friday's game, though, will be on a different channel.

Here's how to watch Reds vs. Tigers on Friday.

What time is Reds vs. Tigers on Friday?

Date: Friday, July 5.

Time: 7:10 p.m. E.T.

What channel is Reds vs. Tigers?

TV: Apple TV+.

Radio: WLW 700.

The game can also be live-streamed on streaming services with live TV capabilities.
